name: Book of Bounty Hunter Helm Recipes
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Domain of Vabbi: Hero's Choice Chest
description: Awards your choice of items. Double-click to open.

name: Mini Blue Choya
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Smuggled Book of Mordant Weapon Recipes
description: Double-click to choose a Mordant Weapon crafting recipe to learn.

name: Tournament Title Scroll: Duo of Destiny
Haimi's Raptor-Handling Gloves of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Dispatch Page 06
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Luminous Vigil
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Wish for Justice
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Precision Blocks
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The flag of Amnoon pays homage to its naval history.</c>

name: Rampager's Rascal Gloves of the Thief
Shadi's Armor
description: Shadi's missing armor.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Breastplate
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Breastplate.

name: Season 1 Memory Box—Flame and Festivals
description: Each box contains three items from the first half of Living World Season 1. Each box also drops Nostalgia Tokens that can be exchanged for different items.

name: Shadi's Gloves
description: Shadi's missing gloves.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Wallshield
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear shield recipe.

name: Threat Report: Magical Dead Zones
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Glob of Condensed Spirit Energy
description: Used to upgrade WvW and PvP ascended armor into Legendary Armor.

name: Marshal's Elonian Vestments
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Gamal, Poisoner of the Well of Severance
Pristine Devourer Fang
description: Proof of valor against devourers. Present it to the ghost of First Spear Dehvad in the Desolation for a reward.

name: 28-Slot Courier's Pannier
description: 28 slots. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Elonian Incense Stand
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Pants
description: A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Pants.

name: Mourning Shroud
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The banner of Joko waves eternal over the clans of Elona.</c>

name: Eye of Kormir
description: <c=@Flavor>These gleaming metal scales earned their nickname because they are flexible but remain true and whole under great strain.</c>

name: Sample Ability Reset Guide
description: Instantly reset all WvW ability points when bought. One per character.

name: Trophy of the Champion Renegade
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Gloves
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Flamestruck Pyxis
description: Double-click to open.

description: 28 slots. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Raptor Treat from Priestess Karima
description: A tasty treat for your raptor.

name: Cord of Tamarisk
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and may be sold to vendors.

<c=@Flavor>This wood, harvested from the mountains of the Desert Highlands, was difficult to obtain but in high demand to support the industry and navy of the early Primeval empire.</c>

description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

description: Double-click to open.

description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Luminous Repeater
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Incriminating Evidence
description: The swindlers at Augury Rock won't get away with their schemes once this is brought to light.

name: Letter from Unja
description: A letter from Unja asking you to visit her at the springer stable at Highjump Ranch.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Mantle
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Mantle.

description: 24 Slots

description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

description: Double-click to open.

description: Double-click to open.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Leggings recipe.

name: Weathered Elonian Obelisk
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Garden of the Gods Page 01
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Pungent Jacaranda Bloom
description: Drops from jacaranda in the Crystal Desert. Has a remarkably savory scent.

name: Rampager's Rascal Pants of the Thief
Kormir Prayer Books
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Share the history of the Sunspears by returning these confiscated religious texts.</c>

name: Springer Carving
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>These little crafts are made with delicate care and love. And because they're made out of carrots, they're good for you, too.</c>

name: Warbeast Hardened Longcoat Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Coats.

name: Royal Funerary Glove Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Mini Awakened Elite Archer
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: 24-Slot Marshal's Locker
description: 24 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Rabid Green Wood Harpoon Gun of Fire
Wildly Inaccurate Textbook
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>You may not be the world's foremost historian, but you are confident that Joko did not, in fact, force the Elder Dragons to submit to him.</c>

name: Cleric's Tempered Scale Pauldrons of the Guardian
Dwarven Dagger Grip
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Questionable Mine Claim
description: <c=@Flavor>Even bandits eventually learn the pen is mightier than the sword.</c>

name: Clump of Dirt
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>The choya seemed very excited to present you with this clump of glistening earth.</c>

name: Highjump Ranch Supply Barrel
description: A supply barrel that should be taken back to Berjas at Highjump Ranch.

name: Marshal's Elonian Mask
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Recipe: Dollop of Choya Harissa
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Dollop of Choya Harissa.

name: Gift of War Dedication
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of War Prosperity, Gift of War Prowess, Gift of War Dedication, and a WvW Ascended Armor piece to upgrade the armor to Legendary.

name: Recipes of the Dwarven Leather Trader
description: Double-click to learn a set of Leatherworking recipes for crafting 24-slot bags.

name: Insignia of the Spearmarshal
description: Used in crafting the Spearmarshal armor set, using the Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, +Precision) stat combination.

name: Cowrie League Trophy Crate
description:
Can contain venom sacs, fangs, or scales of any value.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Tale of Loyalty
description:
Trade this with the traveling historian, Elisa.
<c=@Flavor>Our word was a sacred bond that was respected by our people, our friends, and our foes. Please restore that trust on our behalf.</c>

name: Salomon's Jousting Halter of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Tale of Courage
description:
Trade this with the traveling historian, Elisa.
<c=@Flavor>As a dead person, let me tell you: it's not the worst thing in the world.</c>

name: Banners of King Palawa Joko I
Consortium Cargo Container
description:
Bring these to Harbormaster Yousra by the Amnoon docks to help stop the pollution of the harbor.
Event Item

name: Elonian Thrasher
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Ley-Infused Sand
description:
Used in crafting rare Crystal Desert gear and components.
Also sought after by Priory Researcher Elisa.

name: Mini Forged Officer
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Guard Bribe
description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

name: 24-Slot Courier's Saddlebag
description: 24 slots. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Hamaseen Leather Crate
description:
Can contain rawhide or thin leather squares.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Ogre Springer Treat
description: A tasty treat for your springer.

name: Mini Red Choya
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Spearmarshal's Plea
description: Double-click to activate the relic. It can offer wishes in exchange for Eyes of Kormir, and it can also return you to Spearmarshal's Lament.

name: Recipes of the Dwarven Armor Trader
description: Double-click to learn a set of Armorsmithing recipes for crafting 24-slot bags.

name: Rabid Tempered Scale Pauldrons of the Revenant
Luminous Dirk
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Dwarven Axe Poll
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Recipe: Red Lentil and Flatbread Feast
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Red Lentil and Flatbread Feast.

name: Warbeast Hardened Helmet Strap
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Helms.

name: Cavalier Star
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>These badges are given by Cavaliers to deputize trustworthy allies. Now you've got a gold star, too!</c>

name: Attuned Nadijeh's Dynastic Signet (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Spool of Deldrimor Thread
description: Used to craft larger slot bags, boxes, and packs.

name: Warmed Vabbian Griffon Egg
description:
Collect this and return it to the Sanctuary.

Collecting this will also provide bonus desert Mastery experience.

name: Golden Springer Carving
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>These are much crunchier than the non-golden version, and decidedly less delicious.</c>

description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Quickness Duration; when you use an elite skill, inflict burning on nearby enemies. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45s)</c>

name: Sheet Music Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Gauntlet Plates
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Gloves.

name: Sealed Cask of Oil
description: <c=@Flavor>It's good for cooking and preserving food, sealing boats, and apparently for ammunition.</c>

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

name: Assassin's Rascal Gloves of the Ranger
Honed Sliver of Vlast
description: A honed crystaline Sliver of Vlast, ammunition for Lucius Anvilblade's weapon at Augury's Shadow in Elon Riverlands.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Mantle
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Mantle recipe.

name: Cowrie League Leather Crate
description:
Can contain coarse or rugged leather squares. 
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Riddle of the Soulbeast
description: <c=@Flavor>It is the uncivilized beasts who hold neither spite nor guilt.</c>

description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Assassin's Rascal Shoulders of the Ranger

description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Using an <c=@abilitytype>Engage</c> ability grants quickness and bonus damage for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>
